name: Forging Heroes
description:
A Action Crafting MashUp! A fearsome warrior and a skillfull blacksmith, will have to work synchronously through hordes of angry orcs and make their last stand!

======== CONTROLS ==========

Full Controller support!

Warrior: WASD/Joystick = Movement Space/Click/A = Attack

Blacksmith: WASD/Joystick = Movement Space/Click/A = Interact
